content:
The code chunk implements menu bar functionality for enabling/disabling DIRECT mode and its grid feature within a graphical user interface (GUI) application. The `SGEToolBar` class initializes GUI controls, including checkbuttons under the "DIRECT" menu, that allow users to toggle DIRECT mode on/off and manage the visibility of a 3D scene graph editor's grid overlay.

self.directEnabled = tk.BooleanVar()
        self.directEnabled.set(True)
        self.menuBar.addmenuitem('DIRECT', 'checkbutton',
                                 'DIRECT Enabled',
                                 label = 'Enable',
                                 variable = self.directEnabled,
                                 command = self.toggleDirect)

        self.directGridEnabled = tk.BooleanVar()
        self.directGridEnabled.set(ShowBaseGlobal.direct.grid.isEnabled())
        self.menuBar.addmenuitem('DIRECT', 'checkbutton',
                                 'DIRECT Grid Enabled',
                                 label = 'Enable Grid',
                                 variable = self.directGridEnabled,
                                 command = self.toggleDirectGrid)
